Docs.summary: This class implements MGF1 from PKCS#1: RSA Cryptography Standard (http://www.rsasecurity.com/rsalabs/pkcs/pkcs-1/index.html).
Docs.remarks: This implementation is not compatible with Microsoft .NET Framework v1.0 and v1.1 (implementation bug) but is compatible with PKCS #1.
